title: About Haozhou Xu
texts: Hi, I am a second year Computer Science Master student at the University of California - San Diego. I'm currently working with Prof. Yian Ma and Prof. Rose Yu on projects related to Active Learning.

I received my bachelor's degree from the University of Hong Kong. Previously I worked with Prof. Eric Schuldenfrei and Prof. Hayden Kwok-Hay So. I also spent a summer working at Prof. Hengshuang Zhao's lab as a research intern.
My research interests include Reinforcement Learning, Large Language Models' Uncertainty. In addition, I have a strong passion for photography, welcome to visit my Photo Gallery.
